mapper.select: SELECT h.HISTORY_NO, h.STORE_NAME, h.STORE_ADDRESS, h.MODEL_NAME, h.HISTORY_CONTENT, h.HISTORY_DATE, h.USER_ID, i.HISTORY_IMAGE_NAME AS HISTORY_IMAGE_NAME FROM TB_SETUP_HISTORY h LEFT JOIN TB_HISTORY_IMAGE i ON h.HISTORY_NO = i.HISTORY_NO WHERE i.HISTORY_IMAGE_ORDER = 0 ORDER BY h.HISTORY_DATE DESC
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO TB_SETUP_HISTORY ( HISTORY_NO, STORE_NAME, STORE_ADDRESS, MODEL_NAME, HISTORY_CONTENT, USER_ID ) VALUES ( SEQ_HISTORY.NEXTVAL, #{storeName}, #{storeAddress}, #{modelName}, #{historyContent}, #{userId} )
SELECT SEQ_HISTORY.CURRVAL FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO TB_HISTORY_IMAGE( IMAGE_NO, HISTORY_NO, HISTORY_IMAGE_NAME, HISTORY_IMAGE_ORDER ) VALUES ( SEQ_HISTORY_IMAGE.NEXTVAL, #{historyNo}, #{historyImageName}, #{historyImageOrder} )
mapper.select: SELECT HISTORY_NO AS historyNo, -- 게시글 번호 MODEL_NAME AS modelName, STORE_NAME AS storeName, -- 매장명 STORE_ADDRESS AS storeAddress, -- 매장 주소 HISTORY_CONTENT AS historyContent, --게시글내용 HISTORY_DATE AS historyDate, -- 등록일자 USER_ID AS userId -- 사용자 ID FROM TB_SETUP_HISTORY WHERE HISTORY_NO = #{historyNo} -- 조건에 따라 데이터 조회

SELECT i.IMAGE_NO AS imageNo, i.HISTORY_IMAGE_NAME AS historyImageName, i.HISTORY_IMAGE_ORDER AS historyImageOrder, i.HISTORY_NO AS historyNo FROM TB_HISTORY_IMAGE i WHERE i.HISTORY_NO = #{historyNo} ORDER BY i.HISTORY_IMAGE_ORDER ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_HISTORY_IMAGE ( image_no, history_no, history_image_order, history_image_name ) VALUES ( SEQ_HISTORY_IMAGE.NEXTVAL, #{historyNo}, #{historyImageOrder}, #{historyImageName} )
